actions.committee: Senate Committee on Banking, Housing and Urban Affairs
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Banking, Housing and Urban Affairs.

committees.committee: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

official_title: Joint resolution to provide for an extension of certain laws relating to the payment of interest on time and savings deposits.

summary.text: Provides for the extension to August 1, 1974, of the authority of the Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System to regulate the payment of interest on time and savings deposits.

titles.title: Joint resolution to provide for an extension of certain laws relating to the payment of interest on time and savings deposits.
